title: Falling Whispers, Love and Curses
description: Whispering Falls Island is the ideal location. The "tiny dot in the center of the ocean" is the perfect choice to escape troubles or to blend in without recognition. The weather is typically sunny, the beaches are filled with the purest sand and the resort is kept to the highest of standards.Carmen Davis arrived with the want to put her ten year marriage behind her. She had been looking forward to gaining perspective on her life and to begin again after a very painful divorce.Under normal circumstances, Carmen would have been allowed a simple week to herself, but there was nothing normal about her stay for there was a roadblock in the way, and that roadblock had a name: Dora Alavaro.
author: Trixie Archer
